messages.content: Natalie Lewis works with Lawrence Medina.
Lawrence Medina is a colleague of Nicole Ramos.
Nicole Ramos works with Janice Jones.
Janice Jones is a colleague of Bobby James.
Bobby James works with Christina Hughes.
Christina Hughes is a colleague of Louis Tran.
Louis Tran works with Philip Tran.
Philip Tran is a colleague of Marilyn Fisher.
Marilyn Fisher works with Terry Taylor.
Terry Taylor is a colleague of Thomas Sanchez.

queries.question: Are Natalie Lewis and Thomas Sanchez related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
